pageContext.claim: “And last year, our nation saw the first decline in drug overdose deaths in more than 30 years. ”
pageContext.analysis: According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the rate of drug overdose deaths was 9.6 percent higher in 2017 than 2016. They have not yet released official 2018 data. Provisional data show overdose deaths may have declined slightly since a peak in Dec. 2017, which if accurate, would be the first decline since 2009.
